name: CITY OF PAWTUCKET v. LOCAL 1261, INTERNATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF FIREFIGHTERS AFL-CIO
name_abbreviation: City of Pawtucket v. Local 1261, International Ass'n of Firefighters

parties: CITY OF PAWTUCKET v. LOCAL 1261, INTERNATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF FIREFIGHTERS AFL-CIO.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari and petitioner’s motion for stay are denied.

attorneys: Spencer W. Viner, City Sol., Pawtucket, for petitioner.
Hogan & Hogan, Thomas S. Hogan, Donald J. Packer, East Providence, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
CITY OF PAWTUCKET v. LOCAL 1261, INTERNATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF FIREFIGHTERS AFL-CIO.
No. 82-356-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Oct. 28, 1982.
Spencer W. Viner, City Sol., Pawtucket, for petitioner.
Hogan & Hogan, Thomas S. Hogan, Donald J. Packer, East Providence, for respondent.
